categories: Category:Battles of the Yuuzhan Vong War

nodes.text: An attack on the Vinsoth system was made in 25 ABY by the intergalactic Yuuzhan Vong empire whom where invading the galaxy at the time. The Yuuzhan Vong attack the system after a previous attack on the Ciutric system, and after attacking the Vinsoth system proceeded to split their forces and attack a large number of other star systems. A portion of Vong forces traveled to and attacked the planet New Holgha, while another portion traveled to and attacked the Vandyne system via the Axxila system. A third group traveled to the Botajef system and then split to attack the Bandomeer system via the Hydian Way hyperlane and attack the Columex system via the Salin Corridor.

The attack on the Vinsoth system was first shown in The Essential Atlas, a sourcebook released in 2009 and written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry. The Atlas included the attack in a map titled "Vector Prime and the Yuuzhan Vong advance" which showed the movements and conflicts of the various factions involved in the Yuuzhan Vong War, between 25 ABY and 26 ABY. The book gives no information on the outcome of the attack, but a separate map shows the Vinsoth system was under Vong control by 26 ABY.
